abstract: Walter Julián Martínez Ramos (born on 28 March 1982) aka Pery, is a Honduran football striker who last played for San Jose Earthquakes in Major League Soccer.
comment: Walter Julián Martínez Ramos (born on 28 March 1982) aka Pery, is a Honduran football striker who last played for San Jose Earthquakes in Major League Soccer.
